tool_description: Option greeks provides rapid access to all of the greek calculations for options in the world of finance.
name: Option Greeks
title: Option Greeks

api_list.name: Black Scholes Fair Market Value
api_list.description: Calculates the BSM fair market value for the provided option.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://option-greeks.p.rapidapi.com/option/value"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "option-greeks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://option-greeks.p.rapidapi.com/option/value"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "option-greeks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Option Third Order greeks
api_list.description: Retrieves the option's third order greeks for the data provided. These included: vanna, vomma, charm, veta, speed, zomma, and color.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://option-greeks.p.rapidapi.com/option/third_order_greeks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "option-greeks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Option All Greeks
api_list.description: Retrieves all available greeks, the value, and both implied volatility calculations for the provided option data.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://option-greeks.p.rapidapi.com/option/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "option-greeks.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
